sourceMeaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>car</radical> and an <radical>axe</radical> to <kanji>slice</kanji> down a pedestrian. This innocent guy is just walking along the road when you drive up to him in your car and axe him to death with your axe. You’re all like, VROOM! AXE! Now this guy is dead because you sliced him down in cold blood.
meaningInfo: Imagine driving your car, waving your axe out the window and slicing this guy down. Hear his scream ring in your ears as you slice, slice, SLICE.
readingMnemonic: You were driving around in <reading>Zan</reading>zibar (<ja>ざん</ja>) when you <kanji>slice</kanji>d down this man. Luckily, Zanzibar has no laws at all, so you won’t get arrested for slicing down this guy with your axe.
readingInfo: Zanzibar is a crazy place, huh? Continue to drive around Zanzibar as you wave your axe out your car window looking for another victim to slice.
